theorem.name: app_base_clause

text.english:
Base clause of definition of \(\texttt{app}\):

\[ \forall l_2 \in L_A .\; \texttt{app}([], l_2) = l_2 \]
text.italiano:
Clausola base della definizione di \(\texttt{app}\):


\[ \forall l_2 \in L_A .\; \texttt{app}([], l_2) = l_2 \]

theorem.coq:
Theorem app_base_clause : forall (l2 : listn), app [] l2 = l2.
Proof.
Admitted.
